full_text:
New York Giants
Down & Distance-to-Go Summary

Giants finding success in 2nd & long and 3rd & short

#nflverse

Please like this because it took me 8 hours to make https://t.co/5iqiWPQ7I1

I wanted to try replicating a recent #dataviz by @tanya_shapiro that required using 'ggbeeswarm' for plotting and the 'magick' package for headshot image manipulation.

Here are your current #NFL leaders in average air yards per attempt. #nflverse https://t.co/19zPW9mMP2

As a follow-up, this time I determined the average point differential separately for wins and losses.
The sample size for some teams, e.g. the losing side of the Eagles or the winning side of the Texans, is quite small. But still some nice insights.
#nflverse https://t.co/DhGTR3yo0e https://t.co/NjBNFEqFdZ

I did this especially because of the Ravens...
They better not lead with a TD or more at halftime
#nflverse https://t.co/GBwt7nDOUh
